content:
.  It is always wrong to tell a lie.
10.  You should never ask someone else to do something that you are not will-
ing to do yourself.
11.  If lots of people do something, then it must not be wrong for me to do it.
12.  If it would be horrible for everyone to do something, then it would be
morally wrong for anyone to do it.
13.  If it would not be horrible for everyone to do something, then it would
not be morally wrong for anyone to do it.
14.  Wherever you use the word “nearly,” you could use
